title: Add AI Quiz Simulator to Learn
author: pollinations-ai[bot]

gist.headline: Pop Quiz!
gist.blurb: Why pay for practice? A new AI Quiz Simulator just landed in the community showcase to help you ace your next exam.
gist.summary: Added the AI Quiz Simulator, a web-based tool for replicating exam mock tests, to the community apps registry.
gist.impact: Users can now access a free, AI-powered alternative to paid exam preparation tools.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy study scene. The Pollinations bee is the student, wearing a tiny graduation cap and holding a pixelated pencil. There is a large exam paper with an 'A+' grade on it. The vibe is studious but relaxed, emphasizing the 'free' and 'easy' nature of the tool compared to stressful paid exams.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny graduation cap and holding a pixel pencil next to a large A+ exam paper. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
